page.title: 09UCKFIELD'S INDUSTRY 4.
page.content: Although there are one or two other industrial sites in the town,only one really qualifies as an industrial complex,namely the {Ridgewood Industrial Park}situated just south of the town.The site is sub-let by an engineering company and provides accommodation for a concrete mouldings factory, and a number of one-man service industries. The questionnaire also revealed a {male dominated work-force}although a number of women were employed in electronics. Finally,despite a growing town population, most of the replies indicated a large proportion of the workers{commuted}into Uckfield from surrounding areas.
